header.h2: Here you'll find downloadable PDFs of the problem statements that were presented to you. They have all the information you were given and more!

problem_statements.title: Albemarle County
problem_statements.question: How might we provide an inclusive public participation platform for meaningful youth engagement?

problem_statements.title: HackCville
problem_statements.question: How can we connect high school students who need work-based learning experiences with local tech companies who want to help prepare students to work in their industry?

problem_statements.title: UVA BME
problem_statements.question: How can we ensure food security in remote environments where growing options are limited?

problem_statements.title: WillowTree
problem_statements.question: How can we use technology to give people people a way to track and improve their physical and emotional health?
